content: Add shared parameter processing function prepare_brp_params to handler.rs

Update ToolAttrs struct in brp_tools.rs macro to add format_discovery field and make brp_method required
Update extract_tool_attr function to parse format_discovery attribute and validate brp_method
Remove hardcoded format discovery check and replace with attribute value in brp_tools.rs
Generate two different ToolFn implementations based on format discovery support
Update method match arm generation to simplify logic for required brp_method
Run cargo build after macro changes

Run cargo nextest run
